title: Surgeon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, perform Surgery on someone, healing them (as a doctor would).
- During the day, if 4+ people are dead for the first time, you harvest body parts from them. The next night, turn the person you're performing Surgery on into a Monster, an entirely new "player" controlled by the collective actions of the dead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you turn someone into a Monster, they die. Then, a new player is added to the playerlist, "The Surgeon's Monster", which is announced to the town. The monster can't vote, but can do night actions and speak in day-chat as a normal player would. The Monster begins with no attack and no defense.
- The monster can perform any night ability that a dead role could do. Dead players may input which action to do and which target(s), and one random input will be selected. (ie: One dead player suggests using the ability of a dead vigilante to kill a living player: it is chosen at random, so the monster shoots that player.)
- Each dead player can make the monster say one thing during the day. (The host is the one speaking in day chat on behalf of the monster.)
- The Monster can be visited, voted for during the day, etc. They are identical to a player mechanically other than the fact they are controlled by the dead and cannot vote others.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4246
*The bloodied medium asked the surgeon why she had done such. "Healing you was not the intention of this operation," the surgeon answered, "your body is a catalyst for much more serious work. Don't be so selfish as to deny your fellow townsfolk this gift."*
